featureType.name: CSIRO_EconomicFeasibility_AbatementArea_byState_cp80
featureType.title: Economically feasible area of carbon abatement by state: carbon price $80/tCO2 (CSIRO/BHP)
featureType.abstract:
Modelled economically feasible 25-year annual average carbon abatement (tCO2) and areas of carbon abatement (ha) for four carbon prices ($), for agricultural land. Reporting is by state, with the Statistical Area 2 (2011) boundaries clipped to 100km inland from coastline and then dissolved by state. Includes modelled maximum potential abatement and area
The following scenario settings have been used: • 4% discount rate for net present value • establishment costs of $1000 per hectare • 5-yearly costs of $100 per hectare
Carbon prices per tCO2 presented are $35, $50, $60, $80 (cp35_tCO2... cp80_tCO2), with corresponding potential area of abatement per CO2 price scenario (cp35_ha.... cp80_ha). Maximum potential 25-year annual average abatement (max_abate) and maximum potential abatement area (max_area) also shown.
This layer shows the potential area of carbon abatement under a $80 per tonne CO2 scenario.
